SUBSTITUTES FOR ALL

Frosty_Fruits_is_a_Tumbling_Reel:
Frosty Fruits is a Tumbling Reel Slot Machine. Symbols, which
generate a win, will be removed and replaced by the next
symbols on the reel. Therefore it is possible to have additional
winnings with one reel spin. The Wild symbol substitutes all
symbols except Scatter symbol. All wins pay from left to right,
except Scatter symbols. Scatter symbols pay anywhere on reels.
If 5 or more Scatter symbols appear, the price for 5 Scatters is paid.
3_4_or_5_Scatter:
3, 4 or 5 Scatters start the Bonus Game with 15 Free Spins
and Win Multiplier x2.

Each "tumbling" increases the Win Multiplier.
Win Multiplier steps are: x2 x3 x5 x10 x15.

Once the Win Multiplier has reached x15, all further winnings
are multiplied x15.

Once the "tumbling" has finished, the next Bonus spin
starts again with Win Multiplier x2.

Additional Free Spins can be won with 3 or more Scatters.
All_prizes_are_for_combinations_of_a_kin:
All prizes are for combinations of a kind.
All prizes are for combinations left to right, except scatters.
All prizes are on lines, except scatters.

Scatter symbols pay at any position on screen.
Highest win only paid on each line and per scatter combination.
Scatter wins and line wins are added.

The paytable always shows the prizes for the currently selected bet.
All game outcomes are independent and randomly determined.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
FROSTY_FRUITS_IS_A_TUMBLING_REEL:
FROSTY FRUITS FEATURES A TUMBLING SYMBOLS ON REELS.
WINNING COMBINATIONS TRIGGER SYMBOLS TO EXPLODE.
CONSECUTIVE EXPLOSIONS RAISE WIN MULTIPLIERS
DURING FREE SPINS.
